Description: Almarai Co is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since August 2005. It operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Packaged Foods and Meats. It has Companies operating across Europe and Middle East. Almarai is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 1991.
